response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, but we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an opportunity not only to acquire a valuable asset but also to benefit from a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,200,000. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
